name: Vizier
description: The mind of a sage is filled with obscure lore gained through exhaustive research. This card represents well-intentioned advice.

person: A person who offers helpful advice in difficult circumstances.
Someone who helpfully offers bad advice.
creatureTrap: A helpful creature that leads the way to safety or a goal.
A creature that tries to lead the way into danger or a trap.
place: A place dedicated to knowledge and wisdom, such as a library or university.
A place whose structural flaws threaten its integrity.
treasure: A valuable or magical book or scroll, or a sentient magic item that is known to provide helpful advice.
A device valuable for its components that doesn't function as intended, or a sentient magic item that provides bad but well-intentioned advice.
situation: An opportunity to provide valuable advice on a familiar subject.
An opportunity to provide advice on a completely unfamiliar subject.
